nodes.text: The Sooncanoo system was located in the Northern Dependencies portion of the Inner Rim. During the Waymancy Storm of 7811 BBY, the star system contained the Galactic Republic hyperspace beacon known as Sooncanoo Beacon. The system later fell within the borders of the New Republic between 12 ABY and 13 ABY.

The Sooncanoo system was introduced in the 2012 reference book The Essential Guide to Warfare by Jason Fry and Paul R. Urquhart. The StarWars.com Online Companion to the 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas placed it in grid square K-8.
